org.apache.juneau.serializer

Class SerializerSessionArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.SessionArgs
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanSessionArgs
        • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSessionArgs

  • public final class SerializerSessionArgs
extends BeanSessionArgs
    Runtime arguments common to all serializer sessions.

    This object specifies information such as session locale or URI context.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Default serializer session args.

      • fileCharset

        public SerializerSessionArgs fileCharset(Charset value)
        File charset.

        The character set to use for writing Files to the file system.

        Used when passing in files to Serializer.serialize(Object, Object).

        If not specified, defaults to the JVM system default charset.

        Parameters:
        value - The new property value.
        Can be null.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • streamCharset

        public SerializerSessionArgs streamCharset(Charset value)
        Output stream charset.

        The character set to use when writing to OutputStreams.

        Used when passing in output streams and byte arrays to Serializer.serialize(Object, Object).

        If not specified, defaults to UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        value - The new property value.
        Can be null.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • uriContext

        public SerializerSessionArgs uriContext(UriContext value)
        URI context bean.

        Bean used for resolution of URIs to absolute or root-relative form.

        If not specified, defaults to Serializer.SERIALIZER_uriContext.

        Parameters:
        value - The new property value.
        Can be null.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

        Use whitespace.

      • debug

        public SerializerSessionArgs debug(Boolean value)
        Description copied from class: SessionArgs
        Debug mode.

        Enables the following additional information during parsing:

        • When bean setters throws exceptions, the exception includes the object stack information in order to determine how that method was invoked.

        If not specified, defaults to Context.CONTEXT_debug.

        Overrides:
        debug in class BeanSessionArgs
        Parameters:

        Can be null.

      • locale

        public SerializerSessionArgs locale(Locale value)
        Description copied from class: SessionArgs
        The session locale.

        Specifies the default locale for serializer and parser sessions.

        If not specified, defaults to Context.CONTEXT_locale.

        Overrides:
        locale in class BeanSessionArgs
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        If null, then the locale defined on the context is used.

        This object (for method chaining).
